title: Stage Neutralized After Evenepoel, Roglič Involved in Massive Crash at Critérium du Dauphiné
content:
'My helmet saved me today': Dozens of riders crash on wet roads and officials cancel the stage. Kruijswijk, Van Baarle transported to local hospital.

Read the full article at Stage Neutralized After Evenepoel, Roglič Involved in Massive Crash at Critérium du Dauphiné on Velo.
author: ahood
